settings.escapeHatchDescription: Force your withdrawal via a censorship resistant transaction on {{base}}.
settings.easyModeDescription: Let us handle the extra transactions so you can set 'n forget.

customTokenLists.name: Token list name
customTokenLists.disclaimer: Anyone can create any token, including fake versions of existing tokens. Take due care. Some tokens and their technical parameters may be incompatible with {{app}} services. By importing this custom token list you acknowledge and accept the risks.

activity.error:
Sorry! We're unable to pull your activity feed.
 Please try and refresh the page

tokens.customImportCheck: Make sure you have checked the token address and that it is correct:

confirmationModal.withdrawalTitleEscapeHatchMinutes_one: Escape hatch withdrawals from {{rollup}} take ~{{count}} min
confirmationModal.withdrawalTitleEscapeHatchMinutes_other: Escape hatch withdrawals from {{rollup}} take ~{{count}} mins
confirmationModal.withdrawalTitleEscapeHatchHours_one: Escape hatch withdrawals from {{rollup}} take ~{{count}} hours
confirmationModal.withdrawalTitleEscapeHatchHours_other: Escape hatch withdrawals from {{rollup}} take ~{{count}} hours
confirmationModal.withdrawalTitleEscapeHatchDays_one: Escape hatch withdrawals from {{rollup}} take ~{{count}} days
confirmationModal.withdrawalTitleEscapeHatchDays_other: Escape hatch withdrawals from {{rollup}} take ~{{count}} days
confirmationModal.cctpDescription: Bridging native USDC via CCTP is a 3 step process, requiring 2 transactions on {{from}} and 1 transaction on {{to}}.
confirmationModal.cctpDescriptionEscapeHatch: Using Escape Hatch to force native {{symbol}} withdrawals is a 3 step process, requiring 2 transactions on {{to}} and 1 transaction on {{from}}.
confirmationModal.opDescription: Withdrawing is a 3 step process, requiring 1 {{rollup}} transaction and 2 {{base}} transactions.
confirmationModal.opDescriptionToken: Withdrawing is a 4 step process, requiring 2 {{rollup}} transactions and 2 {{base}} transactions.
confirmationModal.opDescriptionEscapeHatch: Using Escape Hatch to force withdrawals is a 3 step process, requiring 3 transactions on {{base}}.
confirmationModal.opDescriptionTokenEscapeHatch: Using Escape Hatch to force withdrawals is 4 step process, requiring 1 {{rollup}} transaction and 3 {{base}} transactions.
confirmationModal.arbDescription: Withdrawing is a 2 step process, requiring 1 {{rollup}} transaction and 1 {{base}} transaction.
confirmationModal.arbDescriptionToken: Withdrawing is a 3 step process, requiring 2 transactions on {{rollup}} and 1 on {{base}}.
confirmationModal.checkbox1Cctp: I understand it will take ~{{mins}} mins until my funds are claimable on {{to}}
confirmationModal.checkbox1Deposit: I understand it will take ~{{mins}} mins until my funds are on {{rollup}}
confirmationModal.opCheckbox1WithdrawalMinutes_one: I understand it will take ~{{count}} min until my funds are claimable on {{base}} after I prove my withdrawal
confirmationModal.opCheckbox1WithdrawalMinutes_other: I understand it will take ~{{count}} mins until my funds are claimable on {{base}} after I prove my withdrawal
confirmationModal.opCheckbox1WithdrawalHours_one: I understand it will take ~{{count}} hour until my funds are claimable on {{base}} after I prove my withdrawal
confirmationModal.opCheckbox1WithdrawalHours_other: I understand it will take ~{{count}} hours until my funds are claimable on {{base}} after I prove my withdrawal
confirmationModal.opCheckbox1WithdrawalDays_one: I understand it will take ~{{count}} day until my funds are claimable on {{base}} after I prove my withdrawal
confirmationModal.opCheckbox1WithdrawalDays_other: I understand it will take ~{{count}} days until my funds are claimable on {{base}} after I prove my withdrawal
confirmationModal.arbCheckbox1WithdrawalMinutes_one: I understand it will take ~{{count}} min until my funds are claimable on {{base}}
confirmationModal.arbCheckbox1WithdrawalMinutes_other: I understand it will take ~{{count}} mins until my funds are claimable on {{base}}
confirmationModal.arbCheckbox1WithdrawalHours_one: I understand it will take ~{{count}} hour until my funds are claimable on {{base}}
confirmationModal.arbCheckbox1WithdrawalHours_other: I understand it will take ~{{count}} hours until my funds are claimable on {{base}}
confirmationModal.arbCheckbox1WithdrawalDays_one: I understand it will take ~{{count}} day until my funds are claimable on {{base}}
confirmationModal.arbCheckbox1WithdrawalDays_other: I understand it will take ~{{count}} days until my funds are claimable on {{base}}
confirmationModal.checkbox2Deposit: I understand once a deposit is initiated it cannot be sped up or cancelled
confirmationModal.checkbox2Withdrawal: I understand once a withdrawal is initiated it cannot be sped up or cancelled
confirmationModal.checkbox3: I understand network fees are approximate and will change

tos.superbridge1: This interface is only a layer over the native bridge contracts for official Superchain rollups.
tos.superbridge2: No funds are held in custody by Superbridge at any point.
tos.superbridge3: For bridging help please head over to <0>support & FAQs</0>.
tos.superbridge4: By using this interface you agree to our <0>Terms and Privacy Policy</0>.
tos.dedicated1: This interface is only a layer over the native bridge contracts for <0>{{name}}</0>.
tos.forceReadTerms: Please read and agree to the Terms of Service
tos.forceReadPrivacy: Please read and agree to the Privacy Policy

noGasModal.usdc: Bridging USDC requires an extra transaction on {{to}}. Please top up {{gas}} on {{to}} to complete this bridge.
noGasModal.opWithdrawing: Withdrawing requires 2 extra transactions on {{to}}. Please top up {{gas}} on {{to}} to complete this withdrawal.
noGasModal.arbWithdrawing: Withdrawing {{token}} requires an extra transaction on {{to}}. Please top up {{gas}} on {{to}} to complete this withdrawal.
noGasModal.depositing: Without gas on {{to}} you won't be able to make any transactions. Please top up {{gas}} on {{to}} before attempting this bridge.
